languages.text: "Убили? Пожалуй, не буду спрашивать о подробностях — опасно донимать расспросами {mf|того|ту}, кто смог одолеть Его Светлость Винтерскейла. В таком случае позвольте поднять чашу за вашу боевую удаль!"

traits.locale_text: "Убили? Пожалуй, не буду спрашивать о подробностях — опасно донимать расспросами {mf|того|ту}, кто смог одолеть Его Светлость Винтерскейла. В таком случае позвольте поднять чашу за вашу боевую удаль!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Killed him? I suppose we can skip the details. It's dangerous to ask too many questions of the {mf|man|woman} who took down His Lordship Winterscale. All right then, here's to your courage in battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Killed him? I suppose we can skip the details. It's dangerous to ask too many questions of the {mf|man|woman} who took down His Lordship Winterscale. All right then, here's to your courage in battle!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “你杀了他？那具体情况我就不多问了。既然大人你杀了温特斯凯尔大人，如果我再问太多事情，那恐怕就太危险了。好，既然这样，咱们为你的勇气干杯吧！”
languages.original_text: "Killed him? I suppose we can skip the details. It's dangerous to ask too many questions of the {mf|man|woman} who took down His Lordship Winterscale. All right then, here's to your courage in battle!"

traits.locale_text: “杀了？那具体情况我就不多问了。既然大人你杀了温特斯凯尔大人，如果我再问太多事情，那恐怕就太危险了。好，既然这样，咱们为你的勇气干杯吧！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「彼を殺したって？詳細は端折りましょう。ウィンタースケール様を殺した{mf|男|女}を質問攻めにするのは危険ですからね。では、あなたの戦での勇気に乾杯！」
languages.original_text: "Killed him? I suppose we can skip the details. It's dangerous to ask too many questions of the {mf|man|woman} who took down His Lordship Winterscale. All right then, here's to your courage in battle!"

traits.locale_text: 「彼を殺したって？詳細は端折りましょう。ウィンタースケール様を殺した{mf|男|女}を質問攻めにするのは危険ですからね。では、あなたの戦での勇気に乾杯！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «¿Matado? Supongo que podemos obviar los detalles. Es demasiado peligroso hacerle demasiada preguntas {mf|al|a la} {mf|hombre|mujer} que acabó con la vida de Lord Winterscale. ¡Brindemos por su valentía!».
languages.original_text: "Killed him? I suppose we can skip the details. It's dangerous to ask too many questions of the {mf|man|woman} who took down His Lordship Winterscale. All right then, here's to your courage in battle!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Matado? Supongo que podemos obviar los detalles. Es demasiado peligroso hacerle demasiada preguntas {mf|al|a la} {mf|hombre|mujer} que acabó con la vida de Lord Winterscale. ¡Brindemos por su valentía!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Getötet? Wir können die Details wohl überspringen. Man sollte {mf|dem Mann, der|der Frau, die} seine Lordschaft Winterzunder ausgeschaltet hat, lieber nicht zu viele Fragen stellen. Also gut, dann auf Euren Mut im Kampf!"
languages.original_text: "Killed him? I suppose we can skip the details. It's dangerous to ask too many questions of the {mf|man|woman} who took down His Lordship Winterscale. All right then, here's to your courage in battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Getötet? Wir können die Details wohl überspringen. Man sollte {mf|dem Mann, der|der Frau, die} seine Lordschaft Winterzunder ausgeschaltet hat, lieber nicht zu viele Fragen stellen. Also gut, dann auf Euren Mut im Kampf!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Vous l'avez tué ? Je suppose que je n'ai pas besoin de connaître les détails. Il vaut mieux ne pas poser trop de questions {mf|au tueur|à la tueuse} de Calligos Winterscale. Bien, trinquons à votre courage dans les combats à venir ! »
languages.original_text: "Killed him? I suppose we can skip the details. It's dangerous to ask too many questions of the {mf|man|woman} who took down His Lordship Winterscale. All right then, here's to your courage in battle!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous l'avez tué ? Je suppose que je n'ai pas besoin de connaître les détails. Il vaut mieux ne pas poser trop de questions {mf|au tueur|à la tueuse} de Calligos Winterscale. Bien, trinquons à votre courage dans les combats à venir ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Öldürdünüz mü? Neyse, ayrıntılara girmeyelim. Lord Winterscale Hazretleri'ni öldüren birine çok soru sormak tehlikeli olur. Haydi o vakit, cesaretinize!"
languages.original_text: "Killed him? I suppose we can skip the details. It's dangerous to ask too many questions of the {mf|man|woman} who took down His Lordship Winterscale. All right then, here's to your courage in battle!"
